item.title: How to Enable Docker in Lxc
item.description: How to install docker-ce in lxc container in pve At now, Proxmox is base debian and it can be install docker directly. To install docker in host without proxmox support. It will be lost HA function. Deploy a vm then install docker-ce in the vm, it works. but take a lot resource than directly install docker in proxmox. Is there a way to take less performance ,at the same time
